tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following values for oxygen will be larger than the corresponding value for boron?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W)Atomic radius
X)Ionization energy
Y)Melting point
Z)Metallic character
bonus_question: -   –  What allotrope of sulfur contains irreducible units of S8 rings and is the most stable allotrope at room temperature and atmospheric pressure?
